entries.kaja8: That's the spirit!  Now, here's where you can find the governor.  I'll add the information to your datapad.  Make sure nothing happens to him.
entries.kaja7_reply1: I'll have to change everyone's attitude then.
entries.kaja7: Well, the emperor has lost several good agents trying to protect the governor, so it was decided that we would use someone, a little more...um...non-essential.
entries.kaja6: To be perfectly honest there are two reasons.  The first is, the Emperor wants to test your resolve.  See how good you really are.
entries.kaja5: That is most unfortunate.  Perhaps when your spine grows back you can return to speak with me again.
entries.kaja4_reply2: Why was I requested for this?
entries.kaja4_reply1: Wait...I don't need to hear any more of this.  I'm out.
entries.kaja4: The governor has ruled against the Hutts and some of their more shady trade practices.  Rumor has it that Jabba himself has sent someone to
entries.kaja2_reply1: I will see to it immediately.
entries.gov2: Let's get going then.  Lead the way.
entries.gov1_reply1: Kaja sent me to escort you to your ship.
entries.kaja2: One of the regional governors needs an escort due to some unpleasantness.  I'll mark his location on your datapad, and you can escort him to his ship.
entries.kaja1_reply2: I am too busy at the moment.  I'll come back later.
entries.kaja1_reply1: I am.  What is it that must be done?
entries.kaja1: The Emperor has requested you personally for this task.  I hope that you are prepared to show your loyalty to the Empire.
